com.informatica.mdm.bpm.data

Class SortCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informatica.mdm.bpm.data.SortCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISortCriteria

    public class SortCriteria
extends Object
implements ISortCriteria
    This implementation of ISortCriteria is provided as a default implementation of a sort order element. This is used to specify sorting for the various task retrieval methods of IBPMAdapter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SortCriteria(ParameterEnum taskFilterEnum, SortOrderEnum sortOrderEnum)
      The constructor for SortCriteria requires both a ParameterEnum to specify which filed to sort on and SortOrderEnum to specify the direction of the sorting.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SortOrderEnum getSortOrderEnum()
      Get the direction to sort for task parameter represented by this sort.
      ParameterEnum getTaskParameterEnum()
      Get the parameter of a task to sort on.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SortCriteria

        public SortCriteria(ParameterEnum taskFilterEnum,
                    SortOrderEnum sortOrderEnum)
        The constructor for SortCriteria requires both a ParameterEnum to specify which filed to sort on and SortOrderEnum to specify the direction of the sorting.
        Parameters:
        taskFilterEnum - A ParameterEnum representing the field to sort on.
        sortOrderEnum - A SortOrderEnum representing the direction in which to sort on the specified field.
